exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y x : X y : Y H : exists2 R : relation2 X Y, wexpansion R & R x y The term "TX" has type "Lbl A -> relation X" while it is expected to have type "Type".

In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y x : X y : Y H : exists2 R : relation2 X Y, wexpansion R & R x y Unable to unify "exists2 R : relation2 X Y, wexpansion R & R x y" with "exists2 R : relation2 X Y, bisimulation R & R x y".

In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y x : X y : Y H : exists2 R : relation2 X Y, wexpansion R & R x y Unable to unify "exists2 R : relation2 X Y, wexpansion R & R x y" with "exists2 R : relation2 X Y, bisimulation R & R x y".

original: intros. unfold incl. unfold wexpand. unfold bisim. unfold union_st. simpl. intros x y H. apply wexpansion1 with TX TY. - apply H. - apply H.
